snippet: To the Editor:    I disagree with your argument in an April 30 editorial that more money would make bilingual education successful. I do, however, agree that educational policy ought to be set by educators, not by a ballot proposition....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: I disagree with your argument in an April 30 editorial that more money would make bilingual education successful. I do, however, agree that educational policy ought to be set by educators, not by a ballot proposition.
abstract: Letter from David Skurnick disagrees with argument in Apr 30 editorial that more money would make bilingual education successful, but agrees that educational policy should be set by educators, not by ballot proposition (S)

headline.main: Immigrant Children Thrive in English Immersion; Let Educators Decide
